scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The University of Kentucky. Facilities Management. Capital Project Management Division Records (dated 1963-2021, undated; 1.8 cubic feet; 3 document boxes, 3 photograph boxes, 1 oversize box) comprise photographs (prints and negatives), publications, reports, and honors and awards created, received, or used by the University of Kentucky Capital Project Management Division. Includes inventory images in JPG format of furniture at Maxwell Place. Also includes images (prints and negatives) of University of Kentucky and Community College buildings, sports areas, utilities, 4-H camps, and other facilities-related scenes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the University of Kentucky. The University of Kentucky holds the copyright for materials created in the course of business by University of Kentucky employees. Copyright for all other materials has not been assigned to the University of Kentucky. For information about permission to reproduce or publish, please contact the Special Collections Research Center.
